DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate subject mild moderate kidney problem process breakdown study drug GW679769 body compare healthy subject .
DOC.brief_title: Observational Pharmacokinetic Study Of GW679769 In Subjects With Renal Impairment
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Healthy mild moderate renal impairment . Females must nonchildbearing potential ( hysterectomy , bilateral oophorectomy , postmenopausal ) OR childbearing must negative pregnancy test meet/comply one following : abstinence , doublebarrier contraception , vasectomized partner ) . Be negative Hepatitis B C. Have negative result drug , alcohol HIV test . Have stable renal function . Exclusion criterion : Have peptic ulcer . Abuse drug alcohol . Are pregnant lactating . Have heart failure . Have uncontrolled emesis . Have infection . Have take received inducer inhibitor CYP3A4 CYP3A5 within 14 day study start . Active peptic ulcer disease . Digoxin use . Laboratory result show low iron pepsinogen level , AST CK level > 1,5 ULN , show stool positive occult blood .
